Rulings.Edison:
● This card triggers as a result of another Lightsworn's effect sending cards to the GY. It happens on a new chain.
  EG, If you control 2 copies of Lyla and this card:
  You'll mill 3 for Lyla. On a new chain, you'll mill (and draw) for Garoth.
  Then, on another new chain, you'll mill 3 for the other Lyla, then mill (and draw) for Garoth again.
● Since Celestia, Lightworn Angel's effect to send cards to the GY is a cost, not an effect, Garoth's effect won't trigger because of it.
Rulings.Tengu: ● If you control multiple “Lightsworn” monsters, their End Phase effects don’t chain to each other (they each activate, one after another).

Rulings.Cat:
● 'When resolving ''Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior's'' effect, drawing 1 card for each ''Lightsworn'' monster does not start another Chain.
● If ''Peten the Dark Clown'' is sent to the GY by ''Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior's'' effect, its effect can be activated, even if you draw cards with ''Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior's'' effect.
● See “Jain, Lightsworn Paladin” for additional rulings.'
●

Rulings.Base: 1. When resolving the effect of "Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior", drawing 1 card for each "Lightsworn" monster does not start another Chain.\n2. If "Peten the Dark Clown" is sent to the GY by the effect of "Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior", its effect can be activated, even if you draw cards with the effect of "Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior".\n3. See "Jain, Lightsworn Paladin" for additional rulings.

PSCT.Edison:
① If a card(s) is sent from your Deck to the GY by the effect of a "Lightsworn" monster you control (except by "Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior"): 
Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the GY, then draw 1 card for each "Lightsworn" monster sent to the GY this way.
PSCT.Tengu:
① If a card(s) is sent from your Deck to the GY by the effect of a "Lightsworn" monster you control 
(except by "Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior"): 
Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the GY, then draw 1 card for each "Lightsworn" monster sent to the GY this way.

PSCT.Base: Each time a card(s) is sent from your Deck to the GY by the effect of a "Lightsworn" monster you control, except "Garoth, Lightsworn Warrior": Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the GY, then draw 1 card for each "Lightsworn" monster sent to the GY by this effect.
